description.displayText: We had the pleasure of working with Jessica for 8 months and can't say enough great things about her! She is always punctual, friendly, and is very easy to work with. She started caring for our son when he was 4 months old and he adores spending time with her. They developed a very special bond and I know she genuinely cares for him, showing him so much love and affection. She has a lot of experience and is a mom herself, so she often gave us excellent advice and comfort to us as new parents. My husband and I have been working from home and we were able to focus comfortably knowing our son was in caring hands, laughing and learning with her.  I would highly recommend Jessica to anyone looking for a kind, helpful, intelligent nanny for their child. She's the best and we will miss her!

description.displayText: We interviewed Jessica for a full time nanny position. She was extremely professional on the phone and asked lots of questions to get to know us better. We couldn't say enough good things about her. She is a mom herself so she has hands on experience in addition to her experience as a professional nanny. She was our top pick but we went in a different direction for our child care needs. Jessica would be a great hire for any family.
description.originalText: We interviewed Jessica for a full time nanny position. She was extremely professional on the phone and asked lots of questions to get to know us better. We couldn't say enough good things about her. She is a mom herself so she has hands on experience in addition to her experience as a professional nanny. description.displayText: Jessica was a fantastic nanny for our family. It was our first time going through this process and she made everything so easy and comfortable for us. She started watching our son when he was about 6 months old and he fell in love with her and her fun and caring spirit from day one! My husband and I have strange work schedules and she was able to accommodate us, sometimes with notice only coming the night before. Jessica was great at entertaining our son, while also providing educational experiences and outdoor activities. Our work schedules have changed dramatically, otherwise we would absolutely still have Jessica in our lives as she made life easier in so many ways! The sense of calm and ease I would have each morning when Jessica would arrive and my son's face would light up is unexplainable. We would highly recommend.

description.displayText: Jessica was amazing with our newborn son, and helped when mom needed a small break. She was dependable and cared for our soon as if he was her own. Jessica also brings a wealth of knowledge that allowed us as newborn parents to learn from. If given the opportunity we would hire her again.

Jessica also brings a wealth of knowledge that allowed us as newborn parents to learn from. If given the opportunity we would hire her again.

description.displayText: She is a mother and has a ton of experience with kids ranging from different age group. Although, I didn't hire Jessica  I felt that she would treat my little one as she would with her own kids. You can tell that she truly loves children. Good luck to her and the family that hires her.
description.originalText: She is a mother and has a ton of experience with kids ranging from different age group. Although, I didn't hire Jessica  I felt that she would treat my little one as she would with her own kids. You can tell that she truly loves children. Good luck to her and the family that hires her.

description.displayText: I actually met Jessica several years a ago through a mutual friend giving her great reviews and highly recommending her to my wife and me. Over the years, I have always called Jessica to babysit my children. She is an excellent babysitter. She is trustworthy, always prompt, willing to help, flexible, and most important, she loves kids. In addition, Jessica continues to teach and instill the same educational values that my wife and I instill in our children. For example, Jessica will read bedtime stories and play educational games. I would highly recommend Jessica to whomever is looking for an excellent babysitter.

description.displayText: Jessica was an amazing nanny for our family. She provided such excellent childcare for my son. I felt so comfortable leaving my newborn son with her from day one. I highly recommend her. She worked for my family for 2 years. She is very loving and trustworthy and always punctual! Our needs have changed so unfortunately we no longer needed her services but if you are looking for a excellent nanny you have found her! Thank you.
